docs.lead_paragraph: THE CLAIM: Identical twins have identical fingerprints. THE FACTS: Identical twins often share personality traits, interests and habits. They come from the same fertilized egg and share the same genetic blueprint. To a standard DNA test, they are indistinguishable. But any forensics expert will tell you that there is at least one surefire way to tell them apart: identical twins do not have matching fingerprints.
docs.abstract: Identical twins do not have matching fingerprints; drawing (M)
docs.snippet: Identical twins often share personality traits, interests and habits, but what about their fingerprints?
